unnormalised: For your Diwali party, remember that 15/11/2024 is a Friday, so guests might arrive after 7:30 PM IST due to office. Planning the puja for 6:00 PM is good, but buffer in 30 mins for delays. The fireworks display should start no earlier than 9:00 PM to accommodate everyone. Don't forget to set reminders on your phone a week prior, 3 days prior, and the morning of the 15th Nov to prep!
normalised: For your Diwali party, remember that fifteenth november two thousand and twenty four is a Friday, so guests might arrive after seven thirty P-M I-S-T due to office. Planning the puja for six P-M is good, but buffer in thirty minutes for delays. The fireworks display should start no earlier than nine P-M to accommodate everyone. Do not forget to set reminders on your phone a week prior, three days prior, and the morning of the fifteenth november to prep!
